Alteration 1

Poison Touch
Combat
N1
spell id [id]: 601
effect number [effect_number]: 7
damage [damage]: 5005
spec [spec]: 8396928
range [rng_bat]: 1
casting time [casttime]: 50%
area of effect [aoe_s]: One person
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 5-
Poison (HP damage):10+ [5/lvl]
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Poison [poison], May Use Underwater [uwok])
By touching a target, the magician can poison him. A successful attack roll is required to hit the target, but armor offers no protection.
